title: Noam Chomsky - 1994-05-09 - Bringing The Third World Home - Improved Sound
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound/video quality.
On May 9, 1994, Noam Chomsky gave the talk under the full name of: "Bringing the 3rd World Home, Democracy and Human Rights in the New World Order" at the Unitarian Universalist church in Marblehead, Massachusetts.  Questions and answers follow the talk. 

As is usual, I applied digital noise reduction to remove almost all the hiss/hum.  The noise floor is quite low now.  Also went over the sound second by second to reduce or eliminate as many errant noises as possible.  
For the video, I couldn't do too much, apart from some slight color/contrast correction.  The source is a pretty crisp 360p.


Thanks to Mona Ringel @monaringel255  for the original upload:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4aC1HTmPJ4





Earlier I uploaded an audio-only version with inferior sound quality, now deleted.
